name: Monstrosity
description:
Monstrosity is a 2d platform shooter similar to Megaman! You can Shoot, Dash, and Execute monstrosities found within! This is a two man development project, with the Art being hand-drawn by Tim Janowitz!

-Controller recommended but not required.
-Game progress can be saved

Made with and packaged through Unreal Engine 4.

Any and all feedback is very much appreciated!
